net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.filters

Class Filter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.lapidist.colony.common.postprocessing.filters.Filter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bias, CameraBlur, Combine, Convolve1D, Copy, CrtScreen, FxaaFilter, Lens, Lens2, MotionFilter, NfaaFilter, RadialBlur, RadialDistortion, Threshold, Vignetting, Zoom

    public abstract class Filter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for any single-pass filter.

        protected T setParams(Filter.Parameter param,
